sentences.sContent: The trustees of your pension fund decide which fund manager will invest some or all of your future income.
sentences.sCn: 你的养老基金的受托人决定哪一位基金经理将投资你部分或所有的未来收入。

words.tran: 托管；托管制度；托管人职责；托管领土

trans.tranOther: someone who has control of money or property that is in a  trust  for someone else

trans.tranCn: 移交（财产或管理权）给受托人
